derivation: from G2596 (καταρτίζω) and a derivative of G739 (καταρτίζω);
kjv_def: fit, frame, mend, (make) perfect(-ly join together), prepare, restore
strongs_def: to complete thoroughly, i.e. repair (literally or figuratively) or adjust
outline:
1. to render, i.e. to fit, sound, complete
    1. to mend (what has been broken or rent), to repair
      1. to complete
    2. to fit out, equip, put in order, arrange, adjust
      1. to fit or frame for one's self, prepare
    3. ethically: to strengthen, perfect, complete, make one what he ought to be
